code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookingForm=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',email:'',checkIn:'',checkOut:'',roomType:'Standard'});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();alert('Booking Submitted:\n'+JSON.stringify(formData,null,2));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"section form-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Book Your Stay"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"name",placeholder:"Full Name",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"email",type:"email",placeholder:"Email",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"checkIn",type:"date",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"checkOut",type:"date",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{name:"roomType",onChange:handleChange,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Standard",children:"Standard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Deluxe",children:"Deluxe"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Suite",children:"Suite"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Book Now"})]})]});};export default BookingForm;
